recipes.title: Coconut Curry with Vegetables and Chickpeas
recipes.description: A flavorful and hearty coconut curry made with vegetables, chickpeas, and aromatic spices. This dish is perfect for a cozy dinner and is both vegan and gluten-free.

recipes.title: Banana Oatmeal Pancakes
recipes.description: Delicious and nutritious pancakes made with ripe bananas, groats, milk, eggs, and a hint of vanilla. Perfect for a wholesome breakfast or brunch!

recipes.title: Pineapple Fried Rice
recipes.description: A classic and versatile dish made with cooked rice, vegetables, protein, and flavorful seasonings. It's quick and easy to prepare, making it perfect for a tasty weeknight meal or a satisfying side dish.
